extendedInfo.description: Seeing Central Park - The Insiderâs Guide â¢	Who is playing the next concert on the Great Lawn?â¢	When does ice skating at Lasker Rink begin?â¢	Why is there a statue of King Jagiello at Turtle Pond?â¢	Where is the nearest bathroom?Introducing the official app of Central Park, everything you ever wanted to know about the Park and then some! Created by the Central Park Conservancy, this is the perfect guide for everyone from first time visitors to native New Yorkers.The app features:â¢	Fully interactive map: Headed for the top of Cherry Hill or just looking for ice cream with a cherry on top? Weâve got you covered.â¢	GPS location technology: Do you know where you are? The app does.â¢	Customizable notifications: Go exploring! Set up your notifications and let your phone alert you when you approach any of the Parkâs hundreds of landmarks.â¢	The inside story: Find out all about Central Parkâs breath-taking sights and rich history dating back over 150 years. â¢	The latest news on events: Whatâs going on tonight? Find out with the Central Park events calendar. You can even follow up-to-the-minute posts on our Twitter feed.â¢	Beautiful Central Park photos: Canât make it to the Park today? Take a stroll through over 200 images of the Parkâs most loved points of interest.Itâs the most comprehensive app for Central Park from the people who made the Park the world-renowned landmark it is today. Now you can be more Central to the Park than ever, compliments of our members and staff, who know the park inside and out. The Central Park Conservancy is a private, not-for-profit organization under contract with New York City. Founded in 1980, the Conservancy restored and renovated Central Park, once regarded as dangerous and crime-ridden, to one of New Yorkâs greatest treasures.

reviews.title: Good app for visitors & NYers alike
reviews.comment: The map & info is spot on so you can quickly know what you\'re looking at and plan your route. It\'s a lot better than those paper maps they sell all over the park. The app always seems to fail the first time you try to open it which is a bit annoying. Hope they add so of the geologic info of the park to the app.
reviews.author: Damion Noel

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.comment: Very handy guide for me to explore my favorite place
reviews.author: richard dinh

reviews.title: Events crash
reviews.comment: It always crashes when you click on the events tab. Needs an update, badly.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Way too large in size and does not allow you to save to SD card so app is useless. It is a shame because it seemed like a very nice app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good! But...
reviews.comment: Very good, useful app. GPS feature worked flawlessly on my Droid Incredible. Uninstalling because I simply don\'t have enough space on my phone!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Never get lost in the park, and learn why those statutes are there. Great app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Events?
reviews.comment: I still can not the events page or the news page. This stinks becouse I am mainly interested in going to the events at central park. The only page that opens up is the donation link.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very disappionting
reviews.comment: There is almost no detail on the Central Park map. Google maps shows more.  Needs a serious update.  John
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Kept force closing while in the park. Very frustrating
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Takes Up Way Too Much Space
reviews.comment: At 34MB this app is more than 3 times the size of the next biggest download on my phone (which is Adobe Flash), and 15 times the size of most apps. As soon as it was installed my phone told me I was dangerously low on space. Seems like a nice app, but not worth deleting 10 others to keep it. Wish I\'d taken a closer looks at the specs before buying.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The event section keeps crashing. This app is a great idea but needs some fixes. I also agree that it is too big.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: This is terrible and annoying.  Every time I return to the map, even from another featute in the same app, it returns to the default position and zoom.  I\'m constantly re-panning and zooming in to get back to where I was.  The map always comes up blank and takes a long time (and requires good data reception) to show again!  The regular map app can save-for-offline and naturally caches, and is far better-if only more detail and landmarks were on Google Maps.  I ended up buying a paper map in the park for $2.
reviews.author: A Google User
